Returns: the scroll vector for a given position.
Parameters: int: the target position to which the returned vector should point
computeScrollVectorForPosition(int).Description: Should calculate the vector that points to the direction where the target position can be found. This method is used by the @B_android#support#v7#widget#LinearSmoothScroller_E@ to initiate a scroll towards the target position. The magnitude of the vector is not important. It is always normalized before being used by the @B_android#support#v7#widget#LinearSmoothScroller_E@. LayoutManager should not check whether the position exists in the adapter or not.

ClassDesc: An interface which is optionally implemented by custom @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#LayoutManager_E@ to provide a hint to a @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SmoothScroller_E@ about the location of the target position.
